about.title: About me
paragraphs: I'm a frontend developer passionate about creating accessible and inclusive digital experiences. With a solid background in web development and a user-centered approach, I always strive to implement solutions that not only work well, but are usable by everyone.

My journey in development started with curiosity about how things work on the web, and evolved into a passion for creating interfaces that make a difference in people's lives. I believe technology should be a tool for inclusion, not exclusion.
When I'm not coding, I enjoy staying up-to-date with the latest UX/UI trends, participating in developer communities, and contributing to open source projects.
